cab.content: ^MfU^Barkis Document is the Property of His Britannic Majesty's Government)Copy No.SACHET.C.P.1686.CABINET,DISPOSAL 0jir GERMAN -NAVAL WAR MATERIAL.Note ,by the Actinw Secretary(Cabinet.aaaaBSBftaasasaBaSisaBaBSBBBaiaBBSaaBassReports received from the President, International Commission af Control, Germany, by the Admiralty showing the amount of German Naval War Material destroyed up to date, are sent at certain intervals to the Cabinet Offices.In many cases these Reports are exceedingly bul.ty and it is not considered worth while to reproduce tuem. Copies are, however, available in the Cabinet Offices for inspection at any time.(signed) THOMAS JONES.Aotinto Secretary,Cabinet.2,Whitehall Gardens,s.W., July 361 lfrSO,
